Class SparseEqnMatrix2x2Impl

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
SparseEqnObject<Matrix_xy,Vector_xy>, SparseEquation, SparseEqnDouble, SparseEqnMatrix2x2
public class SparseEqnMatrix2x2Impl
extends SparseEqnDoubleImpl
implements SparseEqnMatrix2x2

Sparse Equation of data type 2x2 matrix for solving the [A]X=B problem. To outside, the index number is from 0 to n-1
